I'm using the WPF Toolkit and added

xmlns:Controls="clr-namespace:Microsoft.Windows.Controls;assembly=WPFToolkit"

to my App.xaml file.

But when I try to reference one of the controls in the WPF Toolkit in my Styles, I'm getting an error.

<Setter Property="Controls.DatePicker.MinWidth" Value="120" /> doesn't work ,
and neither does <Setter Property="DatePicker.MinWidth" Value="120" /> (Error: Cannot resolve the Style Property 'MinWidth'. Verify that the owning type is the Style's TargetType, or use Class.Property syntax to specify the Property.)

 

What is the correct syntax?
